#  Press Releases 

#  Press Releases 

Press Releases 

Year None20242023202220212020201920182017

2024

11.12.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics to Participate in Two Upcoming Investor Conferences](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-participate-two-upcoming-investor-3)

WAQRREN, N.J., Nov. 12, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aquestive Therapeutics, Inc. (NASDAQ:AQST) ("Aquestive" or the "Company"), a pharmaceutical company advancing medicines to bring meaningful improvement to patients' lives through innovative science and delivery technologies, announced today that the 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-participate-two-upcoming-investor-3)

11.04.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics Reports Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results and Provides Business Update](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-reports-third-quarter-2024-financial)

Anaphylm™ (epinephrine) Sublingual Film pre-NDA meeting scheduled for fourth quarter 2024 AQST-108 (epinephrine) Topical Gel pre-IND meeting scheduled for fourth quarter 2024 Libervant® (diazepam) Buccal Film for patients aged 2-5 available through retail distribution channels Finished third 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-reports-third-quarter-2024-financial)

10.25.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics to Present Subsequent Analysis of Pivotal Study for Anaphylm™ (epinephrine) Sublingual Film Demonstrating Comparable PK and PD Data to Epinephrine Injection Regardless of Variable Placement or Intraoral Movement at American College of Allergy Asthma and Immunology (ACAAI) 2024 Annual Meeting](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-present-subsequent-analysis-pivotal-study)

Initial placement or subsequent movement of Anaphylm showed no impact on epinephrine pharmacokinetics (PK) or pharmacodynamics (PD), with all results comparable to epinephrine injection Data demonstrates Anaphylm offers a consistent and permissive method of drug delivery in anaphylaxis management 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-present-subsequent-analysis-pivotal-study)

10.24.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics Announces Positive Topline Results from Oral Allergy Syndrome (OAS) Challenge Study for Anaphylm™ (epinephrine) Sublingual Film](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-announces-positive-topline-results-oral)

Completed OAS challenge study meets both primary and secondary endpoints Demonstrates rapid resolution of allergen-related symptoms beginning two minutes after administration Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile after allergen exposure comparable to non-allergen PK profile On track for a pre-NDA meeting on 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-announces-positive-topline-results-oral)

10.21.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics to Report Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results and Recent Business Highlights on November 4 and Host Conference Call on November 5 at 8:00 a.m. ET](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-report-third-quarter-2024-financial)

WARREN, N.J., Oct. 21, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aquestive Therapeutics, Inc. (NASDAQ: AQST) (“Aquestive” or the “Company”), a pharmaceutical company advancing medicines to bring meaningful improvement to patients' lives through innovative science and delivery technologies, today announced that it 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-report-third-quarter-2024-financial)

09.27.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics Spotlights its Innovative Epinephrine Delivery Pipeline at Virtual Investor Day](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-spotlights-its-innovative-epinephrine)

Announces completion of enrollment in its oral allergen challenge study for the development of its late-stage pipeline program, Anaphylm™ (epinephrine) Sublingual Film Outlines the development strategy for the Company’s next pipeline product candidate, AQST-108 (epinephrine) Topical Gel for the 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-spotlights-its-innovative-epinephrine)

09.09.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics to Hold Virtual Investor Day to Provide Pipeline Updates on September 27th](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-hold-virtual-investor-day-provide)

WARREN, N.J., Sept. 09, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aquestive Therapeutics, Inc. (NASDAQ: AQST) (“Aquestive” or the “Company”), a pharmaceutical company advancing medicines to bring meaningful improvement to patients' lives through innovative science and delivery technologies, today announced it will 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-hold-virtual-investor-day-provide)

08.22.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics to Participate in Two Upcoming Investor Conferences](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-participate-two-upcoming-investor-2)

WARREN, N.J., Aug. 22, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aquestive Therapeutics, Inc. (NASDAQ: AQST) (“Aquestive” or the “Company”), a pharmaceutical company advancing medicines to bring meaningful improvement to patients' lives through innovative science and delivery technologies, announced today that the 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-participate-two-upcoming-investor-2)

08.14.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics Comments on Recent FDA Approval of Non-Injection-Based Epinephrine Product for the Treatment of Anaphylaxis and Reiterates Expected Timing for NDA Filing of Anaphylm™](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-comments-recent-fda-approval-non)

Applauds first FDA approval of non-injection-based epinephrine device Reiterates expected timing for filing of New Drug Application (NDA) for Anaphylm™ (epinephrine) Sublingual Film to the FDA in the first quarter of 2025 WARREN, N.J., Aug. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Aquestive Therapeutics, Inc. 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-comments-recent-fda-approval-non)

08.06.24 

[Aquestive Therapeutics Reports Second Quarter 2024 Financial Results and Provides Business Update](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-reports-second-quarter-2024-financial)

Late-stage pipeline program, Anaphylm™ (epinephrine) Sublingual Film, remains on track for a near-term New Drug Application (NDA) submission to the FDA Expanded sales coverage for Libervant™ (diazepam) Buccal Film for patients between ages two to five with national retail distribution anticipated 

[Read More »](/news-releases/news-release-details/aquestive-therapeutics-reports-second-quarter-2024-financial)

#  Analyst Coverage 

#  Analyst Coverage 

Analyst Coverage 

James Molloy 

Alliance Global Partners

Raghuram Selvaraju, Ph.D. 

HC Wainwright & Co.

Jason Butler 

JMP Securities

Thomas Flaten 

Lake Street Capital Markets

Roanna Ruiz 

Leerink Partners

Francois Brisebois 

Oppenheimer

David Amsellem 

Piper Sandler

Gary Nachman
